snippet: Two days later, Kansas City Chiefs Coach Romeo Crennel and others are still wondering what could have driven Jovan Belcher to fatally shoot his girlfriend before taking his own life.
abstract: Kansas City Chiefs coach Romeo Crennel speaks publicly for first time about linebacker Jovan Belcher's murder-suicide; says he tried in vain to talk Belcher out of it.

byline.original: By TIM ROHAN and DAN DUGGAN
byline.contributor: Tim Rohan reported from Kansas City, Mo., and Dan Duggan from West Babylon, N.Y.

lead_paragraph: Two days later, Kansas City Chiefs Coach Romeo Crennel and others are still wondering what could have driven Jovan Belcher to fatally shoot his girlfriend before taking his own life.

headline.seo: Crennel Tried to Talk Belcher Out of Suicide
headline.main: Crennel Says He Tried in Vain to Talk Belcher Out of Suicide
headline.print_headline: Crennel Says He Tried in Vain To Talk Belcher Out of Suicide
